members.title: Andy Tulett
members.subtitle: Founder and Director of The Focallocal Public Happiness Community
members.text: As a Public Happiness Activist I bring people together around creative ideas, to build projects and Movements which bring a little more peace and well-being into this world.

members.title: Tom McNulty
members.subtitle: Site Reliabilty Engineer
members.text: Site Reliabilty and DevOps Engineer in the Boston, MA area. Tom keeps corners of the internet on and clears the brush to help lay the foundation for projects to be built there.

members.title: Matias Forbord
members.subtitle: DevOps/Full Stack Engineer
members.text: Passionate humanist and engineer working to end poverty. Creating access to work in the Philippine slums.

members.title: Pawel Mordaszewski
members.subtitle: Technical utility player
members.text: Travelling software engineer with a passion for a better world. Recently busy working for the fourth industrial revolution by harnessing autonomous drones using AI analytics sent through IoT on 5G.

members.title: Arty Sidorenko
members.subtitle: Trainee Developer/All-round Information Sponge
members.text: Tech-enthusiast and frequent traveller based in London, UK. Recovering from a past life in financial analysis.

members.title: Sylvain Quendez
members.subtitle: Docuss Founder and Director
members.text: Manager and entrepreneur with broad international experience and wide-ranging technical background. Proven track record in building and directing high performance engineering teams.

members.title: Saud Tauqeer
members.subtitle: MERN stack & polyglot developer
members.text: MERN stack devloper with in-depth experience in developing, managing, scaling, full-stack web applications with highly performant back-end and smooth UI/UX. Eagerly adding more skills under my belt.
